description:
Sosuke`s quest to get Sara into school continues. The question is how to get a princess from another world the paperwork she needs, and Sosuke may have just the family connection to get the job done.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hime to Chichioya / Hime to Tomodachi / Shuukyouka-chan, Batta o Taberu / Hime to Nenrei / Bocchi Chuugakusei
The Princess and the Father / The Princess and Her Friend / Little Miss Religious Leader Eats Grasshoppers / The Princess and Age / The Loner Middle Schooler
姫と父親 / 姫と友達 / 宗教家ちゃん, バッタを食べる / 姫と年齢 / ぼっち中学生
